direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods are fundamental to object comparison and hash code generation, often used together in testing.
The hashCode method relies on the flags state, similar to how getFlags retrieves the state.
Both methods interact with the flags state, though in different ways (read vs. modify).
Similar to isOn, both methods interact with the flags state.
Both methods modify the flags state, though hashCode reads it.
Similar to turnOn, both methods modify the flags state.

enhanced_by.reason: Initializes the flags state, which is crucial for hashCode.
Sets specific flags that can be tested in hashCode.
Resets specific flags that can be tested in hashCode.
Retrieves the flags state that hashCode relies on.
Used to verify that objects with the same flags have the same hash code.
Can be used to verify specific flags affecting the hash code.
Can be used to verify specific flags not affecting the hash code.
